   sarvasattvānāmaparimāṇaduḥkhaskandhavyupaśamāya pratyupasthitaḥ, yaduta	sarva sattvAnAm aparimANa duHKa skanDa vyupaSamAya pratyupasTitaH, yat uta

   tīrthikamāragaṇebhiraghṛṣyaḥ pūjitu bhoti sa sarvatriloke // 52 //	tIrTika mAra gaNeBiH aGRzyaH pUjitu Boti sa sarva tri loke // 52 //
   kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /	kzipru sa gacCati boDidruma indram gatva nizIdati sattva hitAya /
   budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //	buDyati boDi pravartayi cakram Darzati mAru sa sEnya ku sarvam // 53 //
   yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /	yaH imu Badra cari praNiDAnam DArayi vAcayi deSayitaH vA /
   buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //	budDa vijAnati yaH atra vipAkaH boDi viSizwa me kAFkza janeTa // 54 //
   mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /	maQju SirI yaTa jAnati SUraH saH ca samantata Badra taTA eva /
   teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //	tezu aham anuSikzayamANaH na AmayamI kuSalam imu sarvam // 55 //
   sarvatriyadhvagatebhi jinebhiryā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā /	sarvatriya Dva gata iBi jineBiH yA pariNAmana varNita agrA /
   tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //	tAya aham kuSalam imu sarvam nAmayamI vara Badra carIye // 56 //
   kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /	kAlakriyAm ca aham karamANaH AvaraNAn vinivartiya sarvAn /
   saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //	saMmuKa paSyiya tam amita ABam tam ca suKO= atikzetra vrajeyam // 57 //
   (Gv 436)	(Gu 436)
   tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /	tatra gatasya imi praNiDAnAH AmuKi sarvi Baveyyu samagrAH /
   tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //	tAn= ca aham paripUrya aSezAn sattva hitam kari yAvata loke // 58 //
   tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /	tahi jina maNxali SoBani ramye padma vare rucire upapannaH /
   vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //	vyAkaraNam ahu tatra laBeyyA saMmuKatas aBitABajinasya // 59 //
   vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabhya ta tasmin nirmitakoṭiśatebhiranekaiḥ /	vyAkaraNam pratilaBya te tasmin nirmita kowi SateBiH anekEH /
   sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //	sattva hitAni bahUni ahu kuryAm dikzu daSasu api budDi balena // 60 //
   bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /	Badra cari praNiDAna paWitvA yat kuSalam mayi saMcitu kiMcid /
   ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //	eka kzaNena samRDyatu sarvam tena jagasya SuBam praNiDAnam // 61 //
   bhadracariṃ pariṇāmya yadāptaṃ puṇyamanantamatīva viśiṣṭam /	Badracarim pariNAmya yat A Aptam puNyam anantam atIva viSizwam /
   tena jagadvyasanaughanimagnaṃ yātvamitābhapuriṃ varameva // 62 //	tena jagat vyasana oGa nimagnam yAtu amita ABapurim varam eva // 62 //
   idamavocadbhagavānāttamanāḥ /	idam avocat BagavAn AttamanAH /
   sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaste ca bodhisattvā āryamañjuśrīpūrvaṃgamāḥ, te ca	suDanaH SrezWi dArakaH te ca boDisattvAH Arya maQjuSrI pUrvaMgamAH, te ca
   bhikṣavaḥ āryamañjuśrīparipācitāḥ, te ca āryamaitreyapūrvaṃgamāḥ	BikzavaH Arya maQjuSrI paripAcitAH, te ca Arya mEtreya pUrvaMgamAH
   sarvabhadrakalpikā bodhisattvāḥ, te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā	sarva Badra kalpikAH boDisattvAH, te ca Arya samantaBadra boDisattva pramuKA
   yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā	yOvarAjya aBiziktAH paramANu rajaH samA mahA boDisattvA
   nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ, te cāryaśāriputramaudgalyāyanapramukhā	nAnA loka DAtu saMnipatitAH, te ca Arya SAriputra mOdgalyAyana pramuKA
   mahāśrāvakāḥ, sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat, sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko	mahA SrAvakAH, sA ca sarvAvatI parzat, sa deva mAnuza asura ganDarvaH ca lokaH 
   bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //	BagavataH samantaBadrasya boDisattvasya BAzitam aByanandan= iti //
